*******************
INSTALLATION
*******************

NOTE: STAR WARSÃ‚Â® JEDI KNIGHTÃ‚Â®: JEDI ACADEMY? MUST BE INSTALLED AND 
RUNNING ON YOUR PC IN ORDER TO RUN THIS MOD.

Run KotFsetup.exe

KotF will have a complicated but user friend setup.It will search if you have 
Jedi Academy installed in your computer and ask to you if it can&#039;t find After 
that, setup will install required softwares, update Jedi Academy and copy KotF 
file&#039;s to where they belong. Various thing&#039;s will be changed too.

This installation will not affect the functionality of other Jedi Academy
modifications. This installation will not update the Jedi Academy application
that you are currently using. KotF Setup will copy Jedi Academy files on your
hard disk to another folder and a new Jedi Academy will be created for KotF.
New foder name "KotF Jedi Academy Expansion Pack"


*******************
REQUIREMENTS
*******************

Knights of the Force (Part I) requires 2.5 GB space on your hard disk.

Flash Activex 4  <a href="
http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/flashactivexinstaller.exe" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/flashactivexinstaller.exe</a>

*******************
OVERVIEW
*******************

5 YEARS OF HUGE WORK. Knights of the Force 2.0 is a Jedi Academy Modification, 
which the development took place between 2003 and 2008. Previous 1.0 version was
developed and released for Jedi Outcast in 2002.Knights of the Force (KotF) is 
an expansion pack which recreates Jedi Academy with levels, characters, environments,
weapons and vehicles from the 6 movies, cartoons and comics. It is also a detailed 
Star Wars encyclopedia.

The significant feature of this project which pulled great attention of star wars 
fans over the world for its innovations on single player and multiplayer options is
that it provides the chance of playing all star wars films over Jedi Academy.

These maps and models have been revision with movie standards to look more realistic
and move visual for KotF. All maps are bot supported. In addition, the best 30 Jedi
Outcast maps (mostly Star Wars movie maps) have been converted and upgraded 
for Jedi Academy.

Full features : http://www.kotf.com/main/manual/features.htm
Ultimate Trailer: http://games.internode.on.net/filelist.php?filedetails=6129
